problem.markdown:
1. If voltage is increased then current density will increase or decrease? ( ) decrease ( ) remains same (x) increase ( ) none of these
2. If current density is increased then material removal rate will increase or decrease? (x) Increases ( ) Decreases ( ) Do not change ( ) None of these
problem.p: 1. If voltage is increased then current density will increase or decrease?
2. If current density is increased then material removal rate will increase or decrease?
